ygData.subject: RE: Odds and ends.
ygData.msgSnippet: A warrior I know told me about the change in the Soul Leech effect, When I get one I ll let you know (don t I wish).. On the FA quest.. Nice if it exist, but
ygData.messageBody:
A warrior I know told me about the change in the Soul Leech effect, When I
get one I'll let you know (don't I wish)..

On the FA quest.. Nice if it exist, but what I want is a quest anywhere like
this. Having to go to all those locations, do all those task. That is a
quest. Sitting on my ass in Cazic waiting for a Crusader is not a quest it's
a exercise in futility. Hell look at the Soul Fire quest, again a nice drawn
out quest (difficult in parts, easy in others), but again it's a quest not a
camping exercise.. What I would give for one decent quest..

Night all..



-----Original Message-----
From: Krukhan Garabash [mailto:krukhan@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 1999 3:34 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Odds and ends.


From: "Krukhan Garabash" <krukhan@...>

heh...the avenger quest posted is full of holes =) complete bs imo.

we are THE minority in eq. that should explain it all. i can name every sk
on my server over lv30...and count every sk over lv40 on one hand...with the

total number being somewhere under 40. i assume the situation is rather
similar on your worlds as well.

but even so...some of the changes and "nerfs" we face almost seem to say
"don't play this class" as if we'll all dissappear and the whole class can
be removed =)

if i recall correctly the original effect of the soul leech was "supposed to

be" a high level 392hp lifetap (the leech and bladestorm weren't proc'n back

then iirc)...which fits with the godly 345dmg x3 bladestorm proc
etc...seeing it tap for 50 (first of heard of this) is downright
laughable...as are the stats on most of our armor so far (9 sta was good for

exactly 19 hp the last time i checked at lv30).

they said the class/race combination was of "high difficulty" in the
beginning...so, i guess all this is justified by that =)

(really annoying when i've seen brad quote that "high difficulty" bs when
referring to class gripes such as ours...too bad high difficulty when used
in reference to sks doesn't fall in line with the tradion of high rewards in

most games like more areas / a better ending in classic games or a lv49 pet
spell that can dish quad 55's with 19 delay daggers in eq).

that's my whine for today.

-kg

>From: "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
>Reply-To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>To: "'shadowknight@onelist.com'" <shadowknight@onelist.com>
>Subject: [shadowknight] Odds and ends.
>Date: Wed, 20 Oct 1999 11:08:01 -0700
>
>First of all with the new patch has anybody checked the stats on the Dark
>Forged armor (and hopefully they change the color as well)?
>
>On the rumor front, supposedly the Fiery Avenger has been found. Rumored
>stats on sword 33Dmg 33Dly Effect: Combust (180dmg DD or so) Paladin Only.
>Now I don't mind that the Paladin's get a really nice weapon, what gets me
>is that they can obtain their nice weapons through Quest. I would much
>rather obtain a kick ass weapon from questing (not camping, but an actual
>quest) than having to kill a god (Soul Leech, what's with the 50pt lifetap
>though???). Well I guess I'll just have to wait and see if the weapon
>really
>does exist.. And who knows maybe the SK's have some kick ass sword
>available
>by a quest (About the same odds as me winning the lottery without buying a
>ticket).
>
>Enjoy..
>
>Thom
